name: The Blacklist
plot: Raymond "Red" Reddington, one of the FBI's most wanted fugitives, surrenders in person at FBI Headquarters in Washington, D.C. He claims that he and the FBI have the same interests: bringing down dangerous criminals and terrorists. In the last two decades, he's made a list of criminals and terrorists that matter the most but the FBI cannot find because it does not know they exist. Reddington calls this "The Blacklist". Reddington will co-operate, but insists that he will speak only to Elizabeth Keen, a rookie FBI profiler.

episodes.plot: Preview of the upcoming season.
episodes.title: The Chosen One

episodes.plot: Showrunners Jon Bokenkamp and John Eisendrath along with Co-Executive Producer Lukas Reiter give us a few tantalizing hints of what's to come for Red, Liz and the task force in Season 2.
episodes.title: A Look Ahead

episodes.plot: Hosted by Amir Arison, ‚ÄúBehind The Blacklist: Season II‚Äù is a fun peek behind the curtain of this international television hit, presented through entertaining interviews with cast and creators sharing their ‚Äúinsider‚Äù stories, and exciting clip packages that feature everything fans love about THE BLACKLIST -- incredible action, colorful villains, evolving characters, unpredictable storylines, and edge-of-your-seat suspense. The special will conclude with the world-premiere of an eye popping :90 trailer, which will exclusively utilize new footage.
episodes.title: Behind the Blacklist- Season 2

episodes.plot: James Spader, Megan Boone, Harry Lennix and Ryan Eggold share a preview of what's coming up on Season 5 of The Blacklist, premiering Wednesday, September 27 at 8/7c on NBC.
episodes.title: Season 5- First Look (Sneak Peek)

episodes.plot: James Spader, Megan Boone and more of the cast share a sneak peek at the intrigue and adventure to come in Season 6.
episodes.title: First Look- Season 6 Sneak Peak

episodes.plot: The race to stop a terrorist begins in the premiere of this crime series about a most-wanted fugitive who works with a rookie FBI profiler to take down criminals and evildoers.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.plot: Red and Liz go under cover to stop an assassin known as The Freelancer from killing his next target; Ressler and a recently re-hired CIA agent try to protect Red from a distance; Liz wonders what she should do about Tom and the mysterious box.
episodes.title: The Freelancer

episodes.plot: The FBI is on the hunt for a high-ranking Chinese spy, Wujing which Red claims has hired him to help decode a classified CIA transmission. Liz, posing as an FBI cryptographer goes with Red to decode the message while protecting US government secrets. Meanwhile, Liz proactively investigates Tom.
episodes.title: Wujing

episodes.plot: While continuing her investigation into the truth about Tom, Liz testifies against drug lord, Hector Lorca. Later another witness is abducted when he is forced to testify against the dangerous drug trafficker. Red‚Äôs interest is peaked and he informs the team that the witness may have been taken by "The Stewmaker" a man responsible for hundreds of missing and presumed dead people. Meanwhile, in an unlikely twist of events, Red and Ressler must work together for the first time.
episodes.title: The Stewmaker

episodes.plot: Red and the FBI try to stop a dangerous messenger (Robert Knepper) whose appearance is unknown; Liz is thrust into a kidnapping plot.
episodes.title: The Courier

episodes.plot: Tom claims he is innocent and wants to turn the box into the FBI; Red's next target is a beautiful and deadly corporate terrorist (Margarita Levieva).
episodes.title: Gina Zanetakos

episodes.plot: The FBI searches for the man responsible for a chemical attack on a subway; Liz wants to avoid Red after he implicated Tom.
episodes.title: Frederick Barnes

episodes.plot: When Red reveals a new name, Liz learns of a plot to destroy the country's financial system; Tom helps Liz when a loved one falls ill.
episodes.title: General Ludd

episodes.plot: Anslo Garrick, the newest person on the blacklist, tries to capture Red; Liz is caught in an elevator.
episodes.title: Anslo Garrick (1)

episodes.plot: Liz infiltrates the blacksite and disarms the signal jammers to call in backup but runs into trouble along the way. The fate of Ressler hangs in the balance as Red tries to bargain with Anslo Garrick. Meanwhile, Tom becomes increasingly worried about Liz‚Äô situation and the fate of Red is unknown.
episodes.title: Anslo Garrick (2)

episodes.plot: A serial killer from Liz's past strikes again while Red hunts for whoever betrayed him.
episodes.title: The Good Samaritan Killer

episodes.plot: Red informs the team that "The Alchemist" - a man who relies upon science to transform a person‚Äôs DNA - has been contracted to protect a well-known mob informant and his wife. As the team goes undercover to catch him, Liz finds herself on the hunt for an unlikely couple. Meanwhile Liz and Tom find themselves at another bump in their relationship and Ressler debates whether or not he should give his ex-girlfriend his blessing.
episodes.title: The Alchemist

episodes.plot: After a recent spate of abductions of babies from their mothers, Red informs Liz that the "Cyprus Agency" is the illegal adoption organization responsible. Coincidentally, Liz and Tom contemplate adoption of their own which fuels Liz to track down the organizations CEO, Owen Mallory.
episodes.title: The Cyprus Agency

episodes.plot: Liz helps Tom adjust to the impending adoption; Red reveals a woman from his past is a target; Red convinces Liz to pull of a heist at the Syrian Embassy.
episodes.title: Madeline Pratt

episodes.plot: Red believes he knows who was responsible for a prominent prosecutor's 12 year disappearance; Red investigates the woman who tempts Tom.
episodes.title: The Judge

episodes.plot: One of Red's former associates, a crime lord, becomes the next target; Tom decides to confront Jolene.
episodes.title: Mako Tanida

episodes.plot: After a cyber defense asset is stolen by a terrorist only known as Ivan, Red and Liz discover a cover-up; new evidence regarding Jolene's disappearance unravels some of the mystery surrounding Tom.
episodes.title: Ivan

episodes.plot: Red and the team search for a life insurance claim adjuster who talks people into becoming contract killers; Liz and Red try to uncover Tom's secrets.
episodes.title: Milton Bobbit

episodes.plot: As the team tries to protect a target of the Pavlovich brothers -- specialists in abductions -- Red has a job of his own for the duo; Liz patiently pursues the truth about Tom.
episodes.title: The Pavlovich Brothers

episodes.plot: Red thinks the Kingmaker (Linus Roache), a strategist, is responsible when a politician in Prague is framed for murder; Liz uncovers a secret Red has been hiding.
episodes.title: The Kingmaker

episodes.plot: After discovering the truth behind her father's death, Liz refuses to work with Red, just as his situation grows desperate.
episodes.title: Berlin (1)

episodes.plot: In the stunning Season 1 finale, Liz is forced to reunite with Red in order to track down Berlin.
episodes.title: Berlin- Conclusion (2)

episodes.plot: While continuing to battle Berlin, Red faces a new threat in the form of Lord Baltimore. A figure from Red's past returns. Liz tries to move on after her showdown with Tom.
episodes.title: Lord Baltimore

episodes.plot: A robbery provides Red with an opportunity to take down a questionable bank. Liz questions Red's intentions during the course of her investigation. An impressive addition is made to Cooper's team.
episodes.title: Monarch Douglas Bank

episodes.plot: When a body is found missing a heart, Liz and Ressler join forces with Samar Navabi to investigate Dr. Covington's operation. Red and an associate try to take advantage of an opportunity in Indonesia.
episodes.title: Dr. James Covington

episodes.plot: Red thinks a dangerous sociopsychological experiment may be taking place when several previously nonviolent citizens become killers. Red has a complicated proposition for Naomi and her husband.
episodes.title: Dr. Linus Creel

episodes.plot: The team targets an eco-terrorist cell seeking a deadly weapon. Liz attempts to lose her guardian. Red resorts to manipulation to pursue a special someone.
episodes.title: The Front

episodes.plot: Liz asks Red for information about deadly wildlife poachers after a mutilated corpse washes ashore. Ressler forms a dangerous habit.
episodes.title: The Mombasa Cartel

episodes.plot: A plot for revenge emerges after an Iranian nuclear scientist is assassinated. Liz and Ressler wind up in a predicament.
episodes.title: The Scimitar

episodes.plot: Red's plans for Berlin take a sudden turn after he finds out that he was manipulated by the latest Blacklister to avenge Red.
episodes.title: The Decembrist

episodes.plot: When Red is arrested and taken to a secret detention facility, Liz and the task force set out to save him before he disappears forever. At the facility, Red encounters a thief with whom he shares a complicated history.
episodes.title: Luther Braxton (1)

episodes.plot: As chaos ensues at the Factory, leaving the fate of Red and the task force unknown, Cooper struggles to rescue his team from the detention facility. It‚Äôs a race against time to prevent Luther Braxton attaining confidential information.
episodes.title: Luther Braxton- Conclusion (2)

episodes.plot: When an undercover CIA agent is kidnapped by a band of separatists in Uzbekistan, the task force sets a rescue mission in motion. Red informs Liz and Ressler that they are up against a very dangerous former associate.
episodes.title: Ruslan Denisov

episodes.plot: When Red tips Liz off about the disappearance of a polygamous cult leader with dangerous shipping containers buried on his property, the task force sets out to investigate. Red utilizes his sources to appease Fitch‚Äôs last words and tries to track down his hidden safe.
episodes.title: The Kenyon Family

episodes.plot: Red helps Liz and the task force find a killer -- the Deer Hunter -- who tracks victims like prey.
episodes.title: The Deer Hunter

episodes.plot: A former paramour involves Reddington in a deadly game with a wealthy, powerful family dynasty whose ill-begotten fortune was amassed from an underground auction of human and material contraband. Meanwhile, Tom takes on a new mission.
episodes.title: T. Earl King VI

episodes.plot: When Agent Keen is questioned in court as a suspect in the murder of the DC Harbormaster, her unusual relationship with Red and their task force falls under scrutiny. Meanwhile, Red enlists Cooper and Ressler to locate "The Major," a dangerous former associate who is key in keeping Liz out of prison.
episodes.title: The Major

episodes.plot: Evidence mounts against Liz in a murder case, triggering Red and Ressler's efforts to clear her name by tracking down the recently vanished Tom Keen.
episodes.title: Tom Keen

episodes.plot: The task force tracks a scientist who abducts disabled patients to conduct experiments on immortality. Now back in Washington, DC, Tom scrambles to save himself from new enemies.
episodes.title: The Longevity Initiative

episodes.plot: The task force tracks a provocative female Blacklister, a frame-up artist who targets the wealthy elite. Tom pleads for Liz's help. Red pressures Liz for the Fulcrum, claiming it's now a matter of life and death.
episodes.title: Vanessa Cruz

episodes.plot: Red fights for his life while the task force races to track down a mysterious figure from his past while Tom provides help in an unexpected way.
episodes.title: Leonard Caul

episodes.plot: After decoding the information that is embedded in The Fulcrum, Red is determined to stop the imminent threat. Meanwhile, the task force discovers that deceased bodies of Chinese-American women are being smuggled out of the country under false identities. Liz continues to search for answers about her past after discovering a picture hidden in Red's secret flat.
episodes.title: Quon Zhang

episodes.plot: Following intel from Red, the FBI find themselves one-step behind the most dangerous Russian Assassin, Karakurt, an enemy on U.S. soil. To avoid catastrophe, Liz and Ressler meet with Russian Counter-Intelligence who offer insight not only on Karakurt, but also on the identity of Liz‚Äôs mother. Cooper finds himself in a compromising position.
episodes.title: Karakurt

episodes.plot: In the season finale Liz realizes she is being framed by The Cabal forcing Red to use his connections to help her clear her name. As Cooper receives shocking news, Ressler, Samar, and Aram must decide who on the task force can still be trusted.
episodes.title: Tom Connolly

episodes.plot: With the FBI hunting Liz for the murder of the attorney general, she and Red go on the run. Red reaches out to a contact for help fleeing the city.
episodes.title: The Troll Farmer

episodes.plot: With Ressler in hot pursuit, Liz only has Red to trust; Red asks a lawyer named Marvin Gerard for help with a hostage situation. The FBI wants to force Cooper out of the task force.
episodes.title: Marvin Gerard

episodes.plot: Liz and Red take a detour to the Midwest. Ressler, Aram and Samar accidentally uncover what could turn into a global food crisis. Cooper seeks help from an unexpected source.
episodes.title: Eli Matchett

episodes.plot: Red enlists a task force to locate the Djinn, an enigmatic woman who fulfills revenge fantasies. Red and Liz believe the Djinn can lead them to the Cabal and help them exonerate Liz.
episodes.title: The Djinn

episodes.plot: Red and the FBI come together to protect Liz when a huge reward for her capture attracts attention from assassins.
episodes.title: Arioch Cain

episodes.plot: Red and Liz catch wind that Andras Halmi, a trusted advisor of The Director, has gone missing. In pursuit of Halmi, Red and Liz narrowly escape a violent confrontation. Meanwhile, Tom ends up in a brutal "Fight Club" to find the one man he thinks will be able to exonerate Liz.
episodes.title: Sir Crispin Crandall

episodes.plot: A family tragedy in Samar's past resurfaces when the Task Force hunt for an elusive international terrorist. The FBI and the Cabal gain significant ground in their search for Liz and Red. Meanwhile, Tom encounters complications in his plan to exonerate Liz.
episodes.title: Zal Bin Hasaan

episodes.plot: Red and Liz are unexpectedly separated from each other when Red falls into a dangerous situation. Samar makes a risky decision to help Liz while Tom and Cooper continue on their expedition to exonerate Liz.
episodes.title: Kings of the Highway

episodes.plot: Liz awaits trial as Red and Aram take risky measures to protect her.
episodes.title: The Director (1)

episodes.plot: The Cabal prepares to assassinate Liz, triggering Red's call to the task force to outmaneuver the Cabal in a bid to exonerate her. Red delivers a final ultimatum.
episodes.title: The Director- Conclusion (2)

episodes.plot: With her name finally cleared, Liz attempts to reclaim her former life. Red works with the task force to infiltrate an assembly of high-level criminals at large in a rare, risky opportunity to capture the heads of the world's most lethal organized crime syndicates.
episodes.title: Mr. Gregory Devry

episodes.plot: When an associate of Red's is killed with a rare medieval device, Red realizes a lethal vigilante group from the Middle Ages has been resurrected; Liz considers her next move after receiving shocking news.
episodes.title: The Vehm

episodes.plot: Red and Liz work with the taskforce to stop a negotiator who has resurfaced to unite two rival crime families. Tom reconnects with a former flame.
episodes.title: Alistair Pitt

episodes.plot: After a missing child that has been presumed dead turns up alive, Red and Liz work with the taskforce to search for a dangerous woman who may be kidnapping children. Meanwhile, Tom faces shocking consequences after his plan to help Liz goes awry.
episodes.title: Lady Ambrosia

episodes.plot: After the founder of a successful internet start-up is found dead, Red recognizes the crime scene as the work of a notorious killer. Liz and the task force work with Red to track the murderer through a dangerous underground news source. Meanwhile, Tom faces a life threatening situation, while Liz considers options for her baby.
episodes.title: Drexel

episodes.plot: After a State Department official is found dead in Beijing, Red and Liz link the murder to a secret keeper known as "The Caretaker," who maintains an impenetrable safety deposit vault for criminals. Red and Liz work with the task force to find the Caretaker and his collection of lethal and classified secrets. Meanwhile, Tom makes a risky decision, while Liz persists on her quest to find out more about her mother.
episodes.title: The Caretaker

episodes.plot: After Red learns that a tactical nuclear weapon is being targeted by thieves, it's a race against the clock as the task force struggles to stop them -- and prevent an imminent nuclear disaster. Meanwhile, Tom and Liz make a decision that will change their relationship forever.
episodes.title: Mr. Solomon (1)

episodes.plot: A team member falls into grave danger due to a tragedy, leading the task force to rely on Red and his unorthodox methods. Meanwhile, an unforeseen complication impacts Tom and Liz.
episodes.title: Mr. Solomon- Conclusion (2)

episodes.plot: When a mysterious woman running from unknown assailants accidentally crosses paths with Reddington, he assists her in fighting her attackers.
episodes.title: Cape May

episodes.plot: After an unexpected loss devastates the FBI task force, they must track down their assailants; a mysterious group whose agents operate using a worldwide satellite network. Meanwhile, Reddington is forced to confront a ghost from his past -- one who knows many of Red's secrets.
episodes.title: The Artax Network

episodes.plot: When Reddington links an elegant, powerful and extremely dangerous woman to the recent tragic events, the task force is forced to play a deadly cat and mouse game to stop her before she strikes again.
episodes.title: Susan Hargrave

episodes.plot: The FBI task force's hunt for revenge nears its endgame. As Reddington and the team close in on the mysterious arch-criminal responsible for recent tragic events, they're forced to operate outside their comfort zone ‚Äì and outside the law ‚Äì in order to take down their enemy once and for all.
episodes.title: Alexander Kirk (1)

episodes.plot: As Reddington and the task force close in on the person responsible for Liz's death, a shocking betrayal leaves them racing to save one of their own.
episodes.title: Alexander Kirk- Conclusion (2)

episodes.plot: After Liz is abducted by a man claiming to be her father, Red sets out to find her at any cost.  Meanwhile, the Task Force grapples with the shocking news that Liz is still alive.
episodes.title: Esteban

episodes.plot: Red enlists Tom and the Task Force to help track a notorious bounty hunter who may know Alexander Kirk's next move. Meanwhile, Liz struggles to decide if Kirk is trustworthy.
episodes.title: Mato

episodes.plot: Red and the Task Force take extreme measures to hunt down one of  Alexander Kirk's allies, Miles McGrath, a "criminal incubator" who  finances crimes for profit. Meanwhile, Liz learns more about her family.
episodes.title: Miles McGrath

episodes.plot: As Red sets Liz and the Task Force on the trail of an eco-terrorist with  a mysterious connection to Alexander Kirk, Tom takes matters into his  own hands.
episodes.title: Gaia

episodes.plot: Liz's loyalties are tested as Red takes action on an operation to  intercept Alexander Kirk. Meanwhile the Task Force races to find a  killer who targets inventors of revolutionary technology.
episodes.title: The Lindquist Concern

episodes.plot: When Alexander Kirk contracts a mysterious group that specializes in hacking the world's most secure computer systems, Red and Liz see an opportunity to make a move on Kirk's ..
episodes.title: The Thrushes

episodes.plot: Red directs the Task Force to track down an individual who provides new identities to criminals on the run. Meanwhile, as Alexander Kirk's medical condition worsens, Liz seeks guidance from Cooper on a crucial decision.
episodes.title: Dr. Adrian Shaw (1)

episodes.plot: Red pressures Dr. Shaw to locate a former patient. Liz contemplates the implications of her ties to an increasingly desperate and dangerous Alexander Kirk. Mr. Kaplan comes to a critical realization about her future.
episodes.title: Dr. Adrian Shaw- Conclusion (2)

episodes.plot: An investigation into an international terrorist operating on American soil tests the allegiances of the Task Force. As Aram faces the consequences of his girlfriend hacking into the FBI computer systems, Red cashes in on a favor.
episodes.title: Lipet's Seafood Company

episodes.plot: A new case arrives at Liz's doorstep, where someone has left a diorama depicting a crime soon to be committed. Meanwhile, Red explores a new business opportunity.
episodes.title: The Forecaster

episodes.plot: Liz must prove herself to the leader of an elite group of female thieves in order to infiltrate their organization as they prepare for their next heist. Meanwhile, Red contends with unexpected problems in his operations, and Tom channels his energy into fatherly duties.
episodes.title: The Harem

episodes.plot: After discovering his criminal empire is under attack, Red turns to the task force for help, leading the team to hunt an assassin who kills her victims by infecting them with a lethal disease. Meanwhile, Red enlists Tom in an undercover operation.
episodes.title: Natalie Luca

episodes.plot: As another member of Red's team is targeted, the task force races to stop the sophisticated criminal who has been attacking Red and his businesses. Meanwhile, a shocking event sends Tom on the hunt for information about his past.
episodes.title: Isabella Stone

episodes.plot: Aram goes under cover as a hacker to find a criminal who designs and executes crimes for a price.
episodes.title: The Architect

episodes.plot: After being dosed with poison, Red must retrace his steps to discover which of his closest allies has betrayed him, while the task force races against the clock to find an antidote that will save him.
episodes.title: The Apothecary

episodes.plot: After weeks of hunting for Dembe, Red and the Task Force finally get a lead on his whereabouts when Aram goes missing. Meanwhile, Dembe takes a calculated risk as Red closes in
episodes.title: Dembe Zuma

episodes.plot: Memories of the past set Red on a dangerous collision course with an enemy determined to destroy his criminal empire.
episodes.title: Requiem

episodes.plot: The Task Force chases an artful bounty hunter employed to target Red's closest associates. Meanwhile, Ressler faces a moral dilemma when he takes on a new assignment with a former colleague.
episodes.title: Philomena

episodes.plot: Red sets the Task Force on the trail of a Blacklister with the tools to manipulate memories, causing Liz to question her own experiences. As Gale intensifies his investigation, Ressler receives a new lead on the disappearance of Justice Department official Reven Wright.
episodes.title: Dr. Bogdan Krilov

episodes.plot: When Liz becomes the target of a mercenary known as the Debt Collector, Red turns to an unlikely source for help. Meanwhile, Ressler faces an unexpected complication in his efforts to stay ahead of Agent Gale's investigation.
episodes.title: The Debt Collector

episodes.plot: Mr Kaplan's destruction of Red's empire continues, but Reddington still hopes to be able to reach an agreement with his enemy. Amar is issued a subpoena requiring him to give evidence that could destroy the team and Agent Gale realises how much the Task Force know about Red, and gains a new ally.
episodes.title: Mr. Kaplan (1)

episodes.plot: With his empire in tatters, Red makes one last desperate move but Mr. Kaplan may have predicted his play.
episodes.title: Mr. Kaplan- Conclusion (2)

episodes.plot: With his criminal empire in ruins, Red enlists Liz in a plan to earn cash and deliver a new Blacklister to the Task Force.
episodes.title: Smokey Putnum

episodes.plot: Liz and the Task Force join Red on an international adventure in pursuit of a billionaire who moonlights as a high end art thief. Meanwhile, Dembe chases a lead and Tom seeks outside help in identifying the remains in the suitcase.
episodes.title: Greyson Blaise

episodes.plot: While the Task Force investigates a series of suspicious police shootings, Agent Ressler is distracted by increasing external pressures. With his back up against the wall, Red drafts Tom in executing an elaborate plan to help re-establish his criminal reputation.
episodes.title: Miss Rebecca Thrall

episodes.plot: Liz and the Task Force hunt for an elusive criminal who will stop at nothing to destroy some of the world's most precious treasures. Meanwhile, a surprise encounter leads a cash-strapped Red toward a new business opportunity, and Tom takes action to investigate the bones in the suitcase.
episodes.title: The Endling

episodes.plot: When Red provides exclusive intel on an international terrorist, it puts Liz and the Task Force on a collision course with a rival unit from the CIA. Meanwhile, Red and Hawkins lay the groundwork for their new business venture, and Tom goes undercover in search of information.
episodes.title: Ilyas Surkov

episodes.plot: While Cooper enlists Red on a case of personal importance, Ressler leads the Task Force on a mission to stop the resurgence of once-dormant murder-for-hire ring. Determined to find answers, Tom disregards a warning to halt his investigation into the suitcase.
episodes.title: The Travel Agency

episodes.plot: Red and the Task Force place Dembe undercover to infiltrate an international human smuggling organization, but when communication is lost, they must intervene. Meanwhile, Tom's investigation into the suitcase lands him in grave danger.
episodes.title: The Kilgannon Corporation

episodes.plot: Tom goes missing and Liz desperately retraces his steps to find him; Red's hunt for the suitcase of bones leads to lives being changed forever.
episodes.title: Ian Garvey

episodes.plot: Liz abandons her old life and seeks out a fresh start in a place where no one knows her history, her name, or the depths of her grief. When an unexpected threat finds her, she is forced to draw on her emotional and physical strength in a brutal fight for survival.
episodes.title: Ruin

episodes.plot: When Red directs the Task Force to find a Blacklister who uses his position of power to sell sensitive information, Ressler finds himself at risk of exposure. Meanwhile, Liz plans her next move.
episodes.title: The Informant

episodes.plot: When Red goes on the hunt for a legendary treasure, he draws the attention of Abraham Stern, a cunning manipulator who has devoted his life - and the lives of many innocents - to recovering the fortune that is his birthright. Meanwhile, Liz's  quest sends her down a dark path, leading her to study the methods of one of the Blacklist's most dangerous criminals.
episodes.title: Abraham Stern

episodes.plot: As Liz works with Red to hunt for Tom's killers, she begins to question his motives. The Task Force enlists the help of one arsonist to catch another.
episodes.title: The Cook

episodes.plot: When bodies are discovered in abandoned woods, Red points the Task Force toward The Invisible Hand, a group that targets those whose actions are morally reprehensible yet fully legal. Meanwhile, Red steps in to assist one of his employees, and Liz discovers a major clue about Tom's investigation.
episodes.title: The Invisible Hand

episodes.plot: Red assists the Task Force in tracking a mysterious Blacklister who carefully develops airtight alibis for murderous clients. Meanwhile, Liz's reinstatement at the FBI hinges on an evaluation with a psychotherapist.
episodes.title: Mr. Raleigh Sinclair III

episodes.plot: As Liz continues tracking Tom's killers, Red tries to solve a tax issue in his money laundering. Meanwhile, Aram goes out to the field when the Task Force investigates a viral outbreak.
episodes.title: Pattie Sue Edwards

episodes.plot: As Liz investigates new details in a cold case from her early work as an FBI profiler, she explores her darker impulses in therapy with Dr. Fulton. The Task Force takes action to bring down Tom's killers within the legal system, while Red takes a different approach to closing in on Ian Garvey.
episodes.title: The Capricorn Killer

episodes.plot: When an associate of the Nash Syndicate is murdered, Red sets Liz and the Task Force on the case in order to recover evidence crucial to bringing down Ian Garvey. Meanwhile, Aram considers a step forward in his relationship with Samar.
episodes.title: Anna-Gracia Duerte

episodes.plot: In an attempt to apply pressure to Ian Garvey, Red and the Task Force head to Paris to track down a prominent heroin supplier for the Nash Syndicate. Distrustful of Red's agenda, Liz takes her own path in going after Garvey.
episodes.title: Zarak Mosadek

episodes.plot: Liz uses intel from an unexpected source to force Red to uncover the secrets he holds; Red initiates a plan to retrieve the duffel bag of bones.
episodes.title: Ian Garvey- Conclusion

episodes.plot: An unidentified young girl reappears and the team tries to find her connection to the secret Red is hiding.  When her family steps in to protect their own secrets, the investigation turns into a race to save the girl's life.
episodes.title: Nicholas T. Moore

episodes.plot: Samar lands in the crosshairs of an unconventional Blacklister, and Aram and the task force spring into action to find her before it's too late.  Red journeys to Costa Rica to prevent the duffel bag of bones from being sold at an underground auction.
episodes.title: Lawrence Dane Devlin

episodes.plot: Liz and Red face off in a climactic race to find a Blacklister in possession of the duffel bag of bones, forcing the truth about the bones to finally come to light.
episodes.title: Sutton Ross

episodes.plot: Red presents the Task Force with a Blacklist case searching for a plastic surgeon who creates new identities for wanted criminals. Liz and her sister, Jennifer, secretly investigate the events that took place the night the real Raymond Reddington died.
episodes.title: Dr. Hans Koehler

episodes.plot: As Liz and the Task Force race to stop an imminent bombing by an elusive Blacklister, Red has an encounter that will change the trajectory of his life forever.
episodes.title: The Corsican

episodes.plot: While Liz and the Task Force track a notorious underground biohacker, Red initiates a strategy to extricate himself from a problematic position. Meanwhile, Cooper's integrity is tested with a difficult choice.
episodes.title: The Pharmacist

episodes.plot: Red acclimates to his new surroundings in federal prison, where he is challenged by an old rival. Samar goes undercover to stop a black market organization that fronts cash to criminals. Meanwhile, Liz and Jennifer continue their investigation into Red's past.
episodes.title: The Pawnbrokers

episodes.plot: While Red argues in court to uphold the validity of his immunity agreement, Liz and the Task Force question a man whose recent inheritance seems too good to be true and Dembe offers Red some advice.
episodes.title: Alter Ego

episodes.plot: When Red is sent to a federal medical institution following his request to the court for a psychiatric evaluation, Liz and Jennifer use his time away to search for a Blacklister they believe may have valuable information about Red's past.
episodes.title: The Ethicist

episodes.plot: While Red and Dembe enlist Glen's help in stacking the jury to Red's advantage for his upcoming trial, the task force investigates a series of mysterious deaths resulting from weaponized insects.
episodes.title: General Shiro

episodes.plot: Liz and Jennifer's pursuit of a lead on the truth about Reddington puts them in unexpected danger. Red steps in to help mediate a brewing prison gang war.
episodes.title: Marko Jankowics

episodes.plot: As his trial begins, Red puts Liz and the task force on the case of a Blacklister who uses incriminating evidence to extort people -- and who Red believes can prove his innocence.
episodes.title: Minister D

episodes.plot: The Task Force delves into the unregulated world of cryptocurrency in order to stop an impending attack, while Red undertakes a risky endeavor in order to secure his freedom.
episodes.title: The Cryptobanker

episodes.plot: Liz and the task force make a play to uncover the truth about an international assassination in a last-ditch effort to save Red's life.
episodes.title: Bastien Moreau (1)

episodes.plot: Cooper puts his reputation on the line to appeal to the White House on Red's behalf, as Liz and the task force resume their search for The Corsican, a Blacklister with ties to an international conspiracy. Samar's abilities in the field are tested.
episodes.title: Bastien Moreau- Conclusion (2)

episodes.plot: Red and the task force hunt for legendary fugitive Robert Vesco, one of history's most notorious con men. Samar makes a life-changing decision.
episodes.title: Robert Vesco

episodes.plot: Red directs Liz to investigate a secret organization of assassins hired by global intelligence agencies to eliminate former agents, a case with ramifications that will change the task force forever.
episodes.title: The Osterman Umbrella Company

episodes.plot: The Task Force searches for a woman who specializes in hostile takeovers of criminal organizations, and may have intelligence connected to an international conspiracy involving presidential advisor Anna McMahon. Meanwhile, Aram enacts a daring plan to gain leverage over Red.
episodes.title: Olivia Olson

episodes.plot: Liz and Ressler investigate a Blacklister who offers to erase gambling debts -- at a deceptively high price. Dembe grows concerned as Red tests loyalties of their business associates in search of the individual who turned him in to the police.
episodes.title: Lady Luck

episodes.plot: Red and the task force spring into action to stop an anti-capitalist terrorist group from kidnapping and torturing the children of the one percent. Ressler goes behind Liz's back to find out what happened to her mother, Katarina Rostova.
episodes.title: The Third Estate

episodes.plot: The task force is drawn into the investigation of an old case that has gained notoriety due to a popular true crime podcast. Red visits Dom Wilkinson for help making a difficult decision. Ressler makes a discovery about Katarina Rostova's past.
episodes.title: The Brockton College Killer

episodes.plot: Alone in a foreign country after a mission goes catastrophically wrong, Katarina Rostova goes on the run to avoid the forces trying to hunt her down.
episodes.title: Rassvet

episodes.plot: When multiple children are abducted under similar circumstances, the Task Force rushes to find the kidnapper. Meanwhile, Red goes on the hunt for a man who can find anything, while Liz considers a big change.
episodes.title: Guillermo Rizal

episodes.plot: Presidential adviser Anna McMahon faces off with Cooper and the task force in a winner-takes-all race to locate the missing dossier containing details of a conspiracy against America.
episodes.title: Anna McMahon

episodes.plot: As the president's true plan comes into focus, Liz and the task force fight to avert disaster. Red meets in secret with a man who holds information about his past.
episodes.title: Robert Diaz

episodes.plot: After being abducted by Katarina Rostova, Raymond "Red" Reddington finds himself alone in hostile territory unsure of who, if anyone, he can trust. With few leads to go on, Liz and the Task Force venture into unknown danger as they race to find him.
episodes.title: Louis T. Steinhil (1)

episodes.plot: Liz, Dembe and the Task Force continue to search for Red. Red attempts to escape his abductors with help from a surprise ally, but discovers he is not Katarina Rostova's only target in her hunt for information.
episodes.title: Louis T. Steinhil- Conclusion (2)

episodes.plot: Aram goes undercover to infiltrate a secret society of wealthy thrill-seekers, whose entertainment hinges upon spectacular acts of violence. Meanwhile, Red tries to negotiate with a former associate involved in the Townsend Directive, while Katarina Rostova takes steps to insinuate herself into Liz's life.
episodes.title: Les Fleurs Du Mal

episodes.plot: Cooper's moral compass is tested when an officer whom he served with as young man, long presumed to be dead, resurfaces as a POW.
episodes.title: Kuwait

episodes.plot: Liz and the Task Force investigate an infamous assassin who has a long history of weaponizing diseases, but has now turned to even more insidious activities. Meanwhile, Red and Dembe travel to Cuba in search of a lead, and Aram considers a new relationship. Elizabeth Bogush guest stars.
episodes.title: Norman Devane

episodes.plot: Red alerts the FBI to the suspicious death of a scientist specializing in artificial intelligence research. Meanwhile, Francesca Campbell further entangles herself in Red's criminal activities
episodes.title: Dr. Lewis Powell

episodes.plot: The Task Force investigates the unexplained disappearance and sudden re-emergence of a governor. Meanwhile, Red and Dembe surveil someone close to Katarina Rostova, as she inadvertently involves Agnes in an operation of her own.
episodes.title: Hannah Hayes

episodes.plot: Desperate for information about the whereabouts of a longtime friend, Red directs the Task Force to find a blacklister who specializes in untraceable money transfers. Meanwhile, Liz receives some disturbing news from her daughter Agnes.
episodes.title: The Hawaladar

episodes.plot: Red and Liz investigate Orion Relocation Services, an organization that surreptitiously facilitates the disappearance and relocation of criminals. Meanwhile, Katarina delves into the memories of an old friend in order to get additional information about the Townsend Directive.
episodes.title: Orion Relocation Services

episodes.plot: Red and the Task Force pay a visit to a former blacklister, as an explosive confrontation leads Liz to make a critical choice
episodes.title: Katarina Rostova

episodes.plot: With the help of the Task Force, Red tracks a gifted art forger who has thwarted his plans to sell stolen pieces. Aram‚Äôs love life becomes increasingly complicated. Liz and Ressler confide in each other.
episodes.title: Victoria Fenberg

episodes.plot: Secluded on a private island, Red reunites with an old flame and a ring of thieves in a plot to make millions off stolen art. Plans are quickly derailed, however, when guests on the island mysteriously show up dead.
episodes.title: Cornelius Ruck

episodes.plot: The Task Force investigates a series of attacks on data centers perpetrated by a blacklister with a peculiar condition, as Liz conducts a secret investigation on the side. Meanwhile, Glen desperately tries to prove his value to Red after a shipping mishap.
episodes.title: Newton Purcell

episodes.plot: A Blacklist case becomes personal for Agent Park when the team investigates a mysterious disappearance in the Alaska Triangle. Meanwhile, Aram enlists Red‚Äôs help to find out what really happened to Elodie‚Äôs husband.
episodes.title: Twamie Ullulaq

episodes.plot: A blacklist case forces Liz to choose sides between Red and the Task Force. Meanwhile, Red tries to calm a panicked Ilya Koslov, who believes he is under surveillance.
episodes.title: Gordon Kemp

episodes.plot: Liz and the Task Force take on a cold case that may have some new victims. Meanwhile, Red tries to help a friend of Dembe who is in danger.
episodes.title: Nyle Hatcher

episodes.plot: Ressler is forced to confront past trauma and family secrets when his brother takes him back home for a risky job.
episodes.title: Brothers

episodes.plot: As the Task Force investigates a kidnapping executed by seemingly impossible abductors, Dembe lands in a perilous situation. Meanwhile, a recent health scare causes Red to think about a successor.
episodes.title: Roy Cain

episodes.plot: The Task Force investigates an accountant who works for lucrative criminals in order to find the violent and thuggish brothers hired for his protection. Meanwhile, Liz must make a momentous decision.
episodes.title: The Kazanjian Brothers

episodes.plot: Red directs the Task Force to investigate Roanoke, a legendary criminal who orchestrates elaborate extractions. Meanwhile, Liz works to hatch a secret plan with her mother, Katarina Rostova.
episodes.title: Roanoke

episodes.plot: As Liz pushes a source for answers, Red and the task force grapple with the implications of her actions. Tensions boil over and a drastic action is taken, which will change Red and Liz's relationship forever.
episodes.title: Katarina Rostova- Conclusion

episodes.plot: Fueled by his betrayal, Elizabeth Keen seeks vengeance on Reddington.
episodes.title: 16 Ounces

episodes.plot: As Red and the task force search for Liz, she sets a new plan in motion that has catastrophic consequences.
episodes.title: Elizabeth Keen

episodes.plot: The task force investigates an organization of bank robbers with a special expertise in stealing from other criminals. An old blacklist case resurfaces.
episodes.title: The Fribourg Confidence

episodes.plot: Red and Dembe go to great lengths to fulfill the final wishes of a dear friend. Aram goes undercover as an interpreter to a company that provides services to criminals, while Park helps a friend in trouble.
episodes.title: The Wellstone Agency

episodes.plot: The Task Force must race to stop simultaneous danger presented by two blacklisters. Cooper approaches a congressman for intel.
episodes.title: Chemical Mary

episodes.plot: The Task Force investigates the apparent disappearance of a defense contractor. Cooper receives an unexpected offer and Red makes a connection.
episodes.title: Ogden Greeley

episodes.plot: The Task Force is thrown for a loop when they encounter a nefarious enterprise that provides doppelg√§ngers for criminals. Red scrambles to counteract a bold move by Liz.
episodes.title: The Cyranoid

episodes.plot: Red and Dembe land in peril when Townsend deploys a torture specialist who uses unorthodox methods to interrogate her victims.
episodes.title: Dr. Laken Perillos
